description: The goal of this course is to provide advanced practice in Spanish to students interested in pursuing careers in medical and healthcare fields. Through readings on contemporary health issues, i.e., H1N1 influenza, comparative healthcare systems, obesity, chagas disease, etc., students will acquire vocabulary and grammatical structures needed to discuss an array of topics pertaining to health-related professions. Students will also gain awareness of healthcare issues affecting the Hispanic/Latino patient. Oral and written presentations will complement topics covered.
name: Advanced Spanish for the Medical Professions

section.name: Advanced Spanish for the Medical Professions

values.name: Advanced Spanish for the Medical Professions
